phrs.translation: 紫花霍香蓟, 熊耳草, 紫花藿香蓟, 藿香蓟

sentences.sentence: Objective:To observe the effects of Ageratum-liquid on motility of rats.
sentences.translation: 目的：观察藿香正气液及其组方药物对大鼠胃排空及肠推进的影响。

sentences.sentence: Any of several other plants having flower clusters similar to the ageratum.
sentences.translation: 藿香蓟：一种产于西半球的菊科胜红蓟属植物，尤指熊耳草，具有鲜艳的彩色头状花序。

sentences.sentence: The development of allelochemical of Ageratum conyzoides L. on insects was summarized in this paper.
sentences.translation: 本文总结了胜红蓟化感物质在昆虫研究中的进展。
